articles.title: Letters to peasants and pressmen in s. Korea
articles.content:
Letters to peasants and pressmen in s. Korea
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Public organizations in 
the northern half of Korea have expressed support to workers 
and other people of south Korea in the struggle against the 
retrogressive amendment of the "law on the agency for 
national security planning" and "labour law".
   The central committee of the union of agricultural 
working people of Korea sent a letter to the south Korean  
peasants, which said:
   The south Korean puppet clique have unsheathed the 
sword of fascism against workers and other people in the 
strike. This is no more than a last-ditch effort to save the 
"government" from the serious crisis, shuffling off upon the 
people the responsibility for political unrest and overall 
economic bankruptcy caused by their dependent economic 
policy and anti-social rule.
   The letter expressed the belief that the south Korean 
peasants will join workers in the struggle for the 
withdrawal of the fascist laws and  overthrow  the "civilian-
veiled" Kim Young Sam fascist clique, who have cut off the 
lifeline of the peasants by totally opening domestic rice 
market to outsiders, and surely win the democratic freedom 
and vital rights.
   The central committee of the Korean journalists union, in 
a letter to the pressmen in south Korea, called upon them to 
make a positive contribution to achieving national 
reconciliation and the  peaceful reunification of the 
country as well as to the righteous struggle of the south 
Korean workers.
   The letter expressed the expectation that they will 
sternly expose and condemn the anti-national, anti-
reunification moves of the Kim Young Sam "government" and 
fully support the workers' struggle for social democracy and 
human dignity and rights.

articles.title: Letters to int'l and national trade unions
articles.content:
Letters to int'l and national trade unions
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The central committees of 
the general federation of trade unions and eight other 
industrial unions of Korea sent letters to the world 
federation of trade unions, the organization of african 
trade union unity, the international confederation of arab 
trade unions and other international, regional and national 
trade unions.
   The letters accused the Kim Young Sam group of 
railroading  amendment bills on the "labor laws" and "law on 
the agency for national security planning" through 
"parliament" during a clandestine session of assemblymen 
from the "New Korea Party"  only. South Korean workers have 
turned out in the struggle to nullify the evil laws, said 
the letters.
   The letters appealed to international, regional and 
national trade unions, which love justice and truth,  to 
express firm support to and solidarity with the struggle of 
south Korean workers and trade unions for the repeal of the 
"labor laws" and "law on the agency for national security 
planning", regarding it as their own struggle.

articles.title: Birthday of secy. Kim Jong Il to be celebrated in Guyana and Peru
articles.content:
Birthday of Secy. Kim Jong Il to be celebrated in Guyana and Peru
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A national preparatory 
committee for celebrating the 55th birthday of the great 
leader comrade Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Guyana.
   An inaugural meeting was held in georgetown on Jan. 7.
   Leader of the Good Green Guyana Hamilton Green, who 
is mayor of Georgetown, was elected honorary chairman of the 
preparatory committee, and chairman of the Guyanese national 
committee for the study of the Juche idea of 
comrade Kim Il Sung Robert Williams, who is general 
secretary of the Good Green Guyana, chairman of the 
preparatory committee.
   The meeting set a celebration period from January 10 to 
february 20 and discussed and decided on a celebration 
schedule.
   A letter to comrade Kim Jong Il was adopted at the 
meeting.
   A peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 
birthday of the great marshal Kim Jong Il was formed with a 
due ceremony at the building of the national journalists 
association of Peru on Jan. 13.
   Angel Castro Lavarello, chairman of the Peru-Korea 
Institute of Culture and Friendship, said in his speech that 
they will hold Colorful celebrations on the occasion of 
February 16 and adorn the significant day.
   A message of greetings to comrade Kim Jong Il was adopted 
at the meeting.
   An appeal to the people of the world was adopted at the 
meeting.

articles.title: S. Korean students demand abolition of amended
articles.content:
S. Korean students demand abolition of amended "laws"
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Some 1,500 students under 
the south Korean federation of university student councils 
held a rally at Hanyang campus and staged a demonstration on 
sunday, urging the abolition of the recently amended "laws 
on labor affairs and the agency for national security 
planning", according to media reports from Seoul.
   At the rally they vowed to continue fighting in 
solidarity with workers until the "laws" are repealed.
   After the rally, the students demonstrated, throwing 
stones at the tear gas firing police supported by armoured 
vehicles.
   Meanwhile, the federation of hospital unions and other 
labor groups under the umbrella of the "Korean confederation 
of trade unions" met at Myongdong Cathedral in Seoul in 
protest against the retrogressive revision of the "labor 
law".

articles.title: Review of Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Review of Rodong Sinmun
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today 
frontpages a report that the great leader comrade 
Kim Jong Il sent thanks to units for having distinguished 
themselves in carrying out revolutionary tasks.
   It gives an account of a meeting held in mongolia to 
form  a preparatory committee for celebrating   his 55th 
birthday.
   It carries news that papers of nigeria and india devote 
much space to articles praising him highly.
   "let us make general advance  in the spirit of 'arduous 
march'" is the title of a Rodong Sinmun political essay.
   It runs an article headlined "undying work brightly 
indicating the path of literature in the age of 
independence" to commemorate the fifth anniversary of 
comrade Kim Jong Il's famous work "Juche-based theory of 
literature".
   Highlighted in the first page of the paper is news of 
south Korean people's struggle including a grand forum of 
the people on the emergency situation calling for 
nullification of the "labor laws" and "law on the agency for 
national security planning" and a rally  and demonstration 
held by more than 1,500 students of the south Korean 
federation of university student councils.
   The paper informs the readers that public organisations 
in the northern half of Korea sent letters to international 
and national trade unions calling upon them to express full 
support and solidarity for the struggle of the south Korean 
workers and trade unions, the world federation of trade 
unions issued an appeal and sent a letter to the "Korean 
confederation of trade unions" and an international labor 
union organisation and political parties and organisations 
of many countries expressed solidarity for the struggle.
   The paper in a commentary says that the "labor laws" 
recently revised by the Kim Young Sam group are anti-social, 
reactionary fascist ones for a handful of comprador 
privileged clans.
   It runs an article denouncing the traitor Kim Young Sam 
for the retrogressive revision of the "labor laws" and "law 
on the ansp".
   It comes out with a commentary flailing the close tieup 
of the U.S. And Japan over the nuclear issue.
   It in an article deals with the situation of Cyprus and 
the strife of big countries over arms sales market.

articles.title: Poll says no to amended "laws" in s. Korea
articles.content:
Poll says no to amended "laws" in s. Korea
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today 
comments on an opinion poll conducted by south Korea's 
confederation of trade unions among people of various social 
strata through an institute of public opinion.
   The results of the poll indicated that 85 percent of the 
pollees voiced objection to the retrogressive revision of 
the "labor law" and the "law on the agency for national 
security planning" by the Kim Young Sam group.
   This clearly shows that the south Korean people 
unanimously oppose the amended evil laws and the suppression 
of workers by the fascist clique, the daily says, adding:
   it is only too right that the south Korean workers and 
people have risen up in the struggle against the Kim Young 
sam group, who are trying to impose political non-right, 
harder toil and untold hardships in their life upon them.
   In protest against the amended "laws", such workers as 
Jong Jae Song and Ri Yong Sik attempted to burn themselves 
to death and a hospital nurse Kim Jong Sun committed suicide 
by taking poison,  offering a clear evidence that the south 
Korean people's resentment at Kim Young Sam's misrule has 
reached its climax.
   The poll fully mirrored such public feelings.
   The fascist clique must promptly repeal the anti-social 
laws, rejected not only by the south Korean people but by 
the world people, and step down without delay.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan secret agreement made public
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan secret agreement made public
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Yomiuri 
Shimbun recently made public the U.S. Deployment of nuclear 
weapons on Okinawa in 1958 and a Japan-U.S. secret agreement 
on their reintroduction and the use of nuclear weapons 
against Korea and China.
   Rodong Sinmun today says the fact bespeaks that the U.S.-
Japan nuclear tieup has long been promoted and they have 
gone ahead with preparations for a nuclear war, regarding 
Korea and other Asian nations as targets of nuclear attack.
   What the Japanese reactionaries really want is to 
reinvade Asia even with the help of nuclear weapons, Rodong 
Sinmun says, and continues:
   In recent years they developed a long-range nuclear 
warhead carrier rocket and are now putting it in full-scale 
production.
   Meanwhile, the united states has turned Japan into a 
nuclear attack base in return for conniving at Japan's 
nuclear armament.
   Such a nuclear tieup between the two countries has 
gravely threatened the peace and security of Asia and the 
world. The U.S. And Japanese reactionaries have targeted 
Korea and other Asian nations as those they intend to attack 
with nuclear weapons.
   The Japanese reactionaries, oblivious of the nuclear 
holocaust Japan suffered by the U.S. attack, are 
persistently seeking to turn Japan into a nuclear power. By 
doing so, they are inviting another nuclear disaster by 
themselves.
   Japan's choice should not be to seek nuclear armament and 
reinvasion but to give up the adventurous nuclear design and 
seek peace.
   The Japanese reactionaries must act with discretion, 
mindful that the nuclear armament will bring themselves to 
ruin.

articles.title: Let us make general advance in spirit of "arduous march"
articles.content:
Let us make general advance in spirit of "arduous march"
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Let us vigorously 
advance, breaking through difficulties and ordeals. This is 
the mettle and stamina of the revolutionary spirit of Mt. 
Paektu, the spirit of the "arduous march", and is a profound 
essence of our present march. 
   Rodong Sinmun stresses this today in a political essay 
titled "let us make general advance in spirit of 'arduous 
march'".
   Recalling that the political, economic and military 
blockade by the imperialist allied forces to isolate, 
suffocate and stifle the Democratic People's Republic of 
Korea, the bulwark of socialism, is continuing ceaselessly, 
the political essay says:
   to turn the present adversity into favourable conditions 
and valiantly advance toward the final victory is our 
strategy and tactics, the philosophy of life and victory and 
the spirit of the present "arduous march".
   Defending the headquarters at the risk of life is the 
noble meaning and highest aim of the "arduous march".
   We should defend the headquarters of the revolution at 
the risk of our lives in the spirit of the "arduous march", 
braving difficulties for our inviolable life, socialist 
life and the victory of the revolution.
   A period of a great revolutionary upsurge in which drums 
of revolution resound in the spirit of the "arduous march", 
the highest spirit of creation, will impend and our "arduous 
march" will be crowned with victory. 
   The spirit of the "arduous march" is the supreme 
revolutionary optimism.
   There is no one who can match those who are ready to die. 
Let us see who laughs at the last moment excl. This is the 
faith and mind of the ranks of our "arduous march" and the 
supreme revolutionary optimism.
   The spirit of the "arduous march" -- valiant attack, 
breaking through difficulties, continuous creation and 
advance toward the final victory full of optimism -- is the 
revolutionary spirit of our general Kim Jong Il.
   The great leader comrade Kim Jong Il, he is the 
supreme incarnation of the great spirit of attack, the 
spirit of creation, the spirit of victory of our heroic 
"arduous march".
   The present "arduous march" is a heroic and epic advance 
which is impossible without the revolutionary spirit, mettle 
and grit of our general.

articles.title: Immortal work brightly indicating way of literature in era of independence
articles.content:
Immortal work brightly indicating way of literature in era of independence
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today 
dedicates an article to the fifth anniversary of the 
publication of the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il's 
famous work "Juche-based Theory of Literature" (January 20, 
1992).
   The work is an encyclopedic, undying great program of 
literature which gives comprehensive answers to the 
theoretical and practical questions arising in building and 
creating  literature in the era of independence, the author 
of the article says, and goes on:
   The immortal exploit of the respected General 
Kim Jong Il in the work is first of all that he indicated 
a new outlook on literature and art in the era of 
independence onlthe basis of the Juche idea, the most 
correct guiding idea of our era, and gave a correct 
guideline which helps literature discharge its duty to the 
era.
   He advanced a new and unique idea on the Juche-based 
humanics, the kernel in the Juche-based outlook on 
literature and art, clarifying new features of literature 
required by our era.
   His immortal exploit in the work is also that he gave 
perfect answers to the principled problems arising in the 
creation and building of literature and art in the era of 
independence and all the problems of the seed which is the 
hardcore of work, theme, creation of characters and 
description  of life and detailed factors of portraying and 
methods of creation, thus providing a powerful theoretical 
and practical instrument for creating literary and art 
works.
   His immortal exploit in the work is that he gave a 
comprehensive exposition of all the problems arising in 
creating and guiding literature and art by elucidating the 
essence and requirement of the method of the Juche-based 
literary and art activities.

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il highly praised by foreign Party and state leaders
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il highly praised by foreign Party and state leaders
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign Party and state 
leaders highly praised the great leader comrade 
Kim Jong Il.
   Ugo Mifsud Bonnici, President of Malta, when he met the 
DPRK ambassador to his country on January 8, said that the 
maltese people hold the supreme leader of the Korean people 
comrade Kim Jong Il in high esteem and he has wisely led the 
Korean people to progress and prosperity under the present 
complicated international situation. 
   Vassalo Anthony, general secretary of the central 
committee of the Communist Party of Malta, when he met 
the DPRK ambassador on January 9, said that the Workers' 
party of Korea under the wise leadership of comrade 
Kim Jong Il  is a beacon for the world's communists.
   He stressed that there is no change in their support to 
comrade Kim Jong Il.
   A.B. Bardhan, general secretary of the national council 
of the Communist Party of India,  said with pleasure 
that the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il is leading the 
Korean revolution and the world revolution to victory, when 
he met the DPRK ambassador to his country who paid a 
farewell call on him.

articles.title: Container wharf to be built along modern lines
articles.content:
Container wharf to be built along modern lines
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A new, large container 
wharf is being built along modern lines at Chongjin port in 
the northeastern coast of Korea.
   It is built in a peculiar style, linking wharf no. 3  of 
the port with wharf no. 4  with a quay longer and water 
deeper than other wharves.
   A  modern container crane, an open storage ground, 
waterworks  and electric facilities  and operation and 
service buildings will be built.
   The completion of  the project would drastically increase 
the cargo handling capacity of the port and turn the port 
into a larger, modern one. With the building of the wharf 
chongjin port will take on a better appearance befitting an 
international free trade port and more satisfactorily meet 
international and domestic demands for container transport.
   The project is progressing toward completion. 
   The builders have finished more than 80 percent of the 
project.

articles.title: Foreign ministry spokesman on Hebron agreement
articles.content:
Foreign ministry spokesman on Hebron agreement
   Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK 
foreign minisory gave an answer to a question put by KCNA today in connection with the recently concluded agreement on 
the withdrawal of Israeli troops from Hebron.
   The answer is as follows:
   We consider the Hebron agreement, which was signed 
between palestine and Israel on January 15, to be a positive 
contribution to settling the Palestinian problem and 
promoting the mid-east peace process which is at a 
standstill.
   Our position towards the mid-east problem has been well 
known.
   We hold that the problem should be settled in a fair and 
comprehensive way on the basis of the U.N. Resolutions and 
the "land-for-peace principle" and, to this end, the 
legitimate national rights of the Palestinian people 
including the right to foundation of an independent state 
should be restored and Israel should withdraw from golan 
heights and southern lebanon and other Arab territories.
   We will always keep a sharp eye on the efforts of peoples 
in the middle east to achieve regional peace.
